Description: Specifies the directory where the relevant weather data ist stored.

Specifies the types of hydro power plants to build per-unit availability time series for. 'ror' stands for run-of-river plants, 'PHS' represents pumped-hydro storage, and 'hydro' stands for hydroelectric dams.

Maximum state of charge capacity of the pumped-hydro storage (PHS) in terms of hours at full output capacity ``p_nom``. Cf. `PyPSA documentation <https://pypsa.readthedocs.io/en/latest/components.html#storage-unit>`_.

Maximum state of charge capacity of the pumped-hydro storage (PHS) in terms of hours at full output capacity ``p_nom`` or heuristically determined. Cf. `PyPSA documentation <https://pypsa.readthedocs.io/en/latest/components.html#storage-unit>`_.
To avoid too small values in the inflow time series, values below this threshold are set to zero.
When specified, it describes how to normalize hydro time series
Data source used to normalize the data; option 'hydro_capacities' to use the provided 'data/hydro_capacities.csv' or 'eia' for using the eia file
Specify the desired year to be used for normalization
Multiplier factor of the normalization process (default 1.0)
